hero_description: Translate paychecks and contracts instantly for clear, fair understanding. FairWork Contract turns scans into accurate, plain-language rights sheets in the worker’s native tongue, preserving layout, highlighting key terms, and cutting disputes before they happen.
step_view_desc: Select the "Upload your file" button or easily drag and drop your files into the section.
step_preview_desc: Preview the translated pages or check specific sections directly in our online viewer to ensure everything looks accurate before downloading.
step_download_desc: Finally, download your translated document once for free as a high-quality PDF file.
workspace_title: All your translation work in one place
workspace_desc: Translate contracts, pay slips, and key documents instantly — all within FairWork Contract. No switching between apps, no formatting headaches. Just upload, translate, and view clear, plain-language versions that preserve layout and highlight important terms.
process_step_1_desc: Access our online translator to start converting documents instantly.
process_step_2_desc: Select and upload contracts, pay slips, or other files you need translated.
process_step_3_desc: Let our AI preserve layout and highlight key terms while translating into the worker’s native language.
process_step_4_desc: Check the translation and ensure accuracy.
process_step_5_desc: Export as a high-quality file and share with workers or agencies.
faq_word_doc: What file types are supported for translation?
faq_word_doc_desc: You can currently upload JPEG and PNG files for translation. To start, simply log in and upload your document on our Translate page. PDF support will be available in the near future.
faq_cookies: How long will the translation process take?
faq_cookies_desc: The translation feature is currently hosted on a free backend, so it may take up to 10 minutes to complete a translation. Please be patient while your document is being processed.
sign_in_required_desc: Access our powerful document translation tools
sign_in_required_info: Sign in to translate documents into Bahasa Melayu, Mandarin, Hindi, and Tamil
loading_documents_desc: We're gathering all your translated documents and preparing them for you.
my_documents_desc: View and manage all your translated documents
sign_in_required_desc2: Access our powerful document translation tools
sign_in_required_info2: Sign in to translate documents into Bahasa Melayu, Mandarin, Hindi, and Tamil
document_translator_desc: Upload your document and we'll automatically detect the language and translate it instantly with AI precision.
upload_card_desc: We support JPEG and PNG files up to 10MB
drop_file_text: Drop your file here or click to browse
language_auto_detect_desc: We'll automatically detect your document's language
sample_docs_section_desc: Don't have a document ready? Test our translation capabilities with these samples
sample_doc_invoice_desc: Detailed employment contract outlining roles, responsibilities, and company policies for new hires
sample_doc_contract_desc: Monthly salary statement with earnings, deductions, and net pay details
sample_doc_payslip_desc: Monthly salary statement with earnings, deductions, and net pay details
feature_languages_desc: Support for over 134 languages with AI-powered accuracy and context understanding.
feature_formats_desc: Translate documents in PDF, Word, PowerPoint, and text formats while preserving formatting.
feature_results_desc: Get your translated documents instantly with automatic language detection and one-click download.
processing_desc: Our AI is analyzing and translating your content...
processing_note: This may take up to 10 minutes as its on free hosting. Please don't close this window.
translation_complete_desc: Your document has been successfully translated to
document_summary_loading: Analyzing contract... this may take up to 3–5 minutes.
document_summary_empty: Upload a document to see the summary.
